section.title: Using a Custom Button
section.para: This procedure shows you how to use custom buttons to invoke a cluster, host, datastore, provider, virtual machine or instance.

step.para: Go to the page for the item that you created a button for.
Click the custom button group from the taskbar, and then your custom button.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: The automate model is invoked for the specified item.
